bug.short_desc: /bin/re.pl fails to start (missing LexEnv, DDS, ... modules)
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
$ re.pl Unable to locate plugin 'LexEnv' at /usr/share/perl5/vendor_perl/Devel/REPL/Profile/Minimal.pm line 16.
$ re.pl Unable to locate plugin 'DDS' at /usr/share/perl5/vendor_perl/Devel/REPL/Profile/Minimal.pm line 16.

The main package did not require plugins listen in default Minimal profile. Also the DDS plugin was disabled because a required package was removed from Fedora. This is not true anymore. I reenable DDS plugin and list the minimal dependencies.
